channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Men's College Hoops Spotlight: Rebuilding, Villanova Eyes NCAA Tournament Berth
item.description: Villanova nearly taking down UConn showed the Wildcats' growth this season, writes FOX Sports' Michael Cohen.

item.title: Indiana Coach Darian DeVries on Purdue Upset: 'These Types of Rivalries are Fun'
item.description: After Indiana upset No. 12 Purdue, Hoosiers head coach Darian DeVries discussed how "great" the in-state rivalry is.

item.title: Women's College Hoops Spotlight: Georgetown Coach Praises 'Best' UConn Team
item.description: FOX Sports' Laken Litman breaks down Georgetown coach Darnell Haney's eyebrow-raising comments after UConn throttled his team.

item.title: Best Sportsbook Promos & Bonus Bets - January 2026 Top Offers
item.description: Discover the best sportsbook promos and bonus bets for January 2026. Compare welcome offers and top bonuses from leading betting sites.

item.title: bet365 Bonus Code: Bet $5, Get $200 with Code FOX365
item.description: Claim the bet365 Sportsbook promo code which give you $150 in bonus bets.

item.title: Wembanyama 'horrified' by Minnesota shootings
item.description: Spurs star Victor Wembanyama on Tuesday articulated his thoughts on a pair of fatal shootings by federal agents in Minneapolis, saying, "Every day I w...

item.title: Mensah commits to Miami after Duke settlement
item.description: Darian Mensah and Duke have agreed to a settlement of their dispute that cleared the way for the quarterback's transfer to Miami.

item.title: Broncos fire OC Lombardi after falling short of SB
item.description: Broncos offensive coordinator Joe Lombardi was fired Tuesday along with wide receivers coach Keary Colbert and cornerbacks coach Addison Lynch.

item.title: Sources: Belichick not a 1st-ballot Hall of Famer
item.description: Bill Belichick, the eight-time Super Bowl-winning coach, will not be a first-ballot Hall of Famer, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Rodman, Hayes viral celebration caps off U.S. rout
